data.name: hexceed - Animo Pack
data.detailed_description:
Animo


This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Animo!

Puzzle your way through 122 brand new levels - each with an exciting new mechanic!

New Mechanic!


Introducing the Rotating Tile mechanic!



This DLC brings with it tutorial levels for various applications of the Rotating Tile as it can be used with walls, red arrows and blue arrows!
data.about_the_game:
Animo


This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Animo!

Puzzle your way through 122 brand new levels - each with an exciting new mechanic!

New Mechanic!


Introducing the Rotating Tile mechanic!



This DLC brings with it tutorial levels for various applications of the Rotating Tile as it can be used with walls, red arrows and blue arrows!
data.short_description: Unlocks a new world for hexceed: Amino brings 122 new puzzles with a brand new mechanic to shake things up!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
